Sentencas: A high-temperature neutron diffraction study has been carried out on La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 compound in the temperature range 300-1400 K.
Titulo: Structural study of La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 at high temperatures

Sentencas: On doping the parent compound LaCrO3 with Sr at the La site, the orthorhombic (Pbnm) to rhombohedral (R (3) over barc) structural transition shifts to lower temperatures.
Titulo: Structural study of La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 at high temperatures

Sentencas: From quantitative Rietveld analysis it is found unequivocally that there is a two-phase coexistence (orthorhombic and rhombohedral phases with similar to 89 and 11 weight%, respectively) in the temperature range 300-470 K and a three-phase coexistence (with a new cubic phase with space group Pm3m) in the temperature range 480-1400 K. The weight percentages of the orthorhombic, rhombohedral and cubic phases were found to be similar to 49%, 37% and 14%, respectively, in the temperature range 480-1300 K, while over 1350-1400 K, the average weight percentages of orthorhombic, rhombohedral and cubic phases were found to be similar to 41%, 41% and 18%, respectively.
Titulo: Structural study of La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 at high temperatures

Sentencas: The coefficients of volume thermal expansion and linear thermal expansion have been determined for all three phases.
Titulo: Structural study of La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 at high temperatures

Sentencas: The importance of the present study has been discussed for practical applications of the studied compound in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural study of La0.75Sr0.25CrO3 at high temperatures
